text: Coors Field is a baseball park in Denver, Colorado. It is the home field of the Major League Baseball team called the Colorado Rockies. It was named for the Coors Brewing Company. Coors is based in Denver, and bought the naming rights to the ballpark. == Sources == *Green Cathedrals, by Philip J. Lowry Category:Major League Baseball venues Category:Colorado Rockies Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Colorado
title: Coors Field
